name: III. Model Training and Evaluation
content:
Model Used

The core model will be a regression-based approach with adstock transformation:

  • Linear Regression / Regularized Regression (Ridge/Lasso/ElasticNet) – suitable for interpretability and multicollinearity handling.
  • Alternative models: Random Forest Regressor or Gradient Boosting for capturing non-linear effects.

Features Details

  • Adstocked TV Spend
  • Adstocked Radio Spend
  • Adstocked Newspaper Spend
  • Adstocked Digital Spend
  • Lag Features – Spend effects from prior weeks.
  • Interaction Features – Cross-channel synergies (e.g., TV × Digital).

Feature Importance

Feature importance will be determined using:

  • Regression Coefficients (for linear models, after regularization).
  • Permutation Importance or SHAP Values (for tree-based models).
  • This will highlight which channels have the most persistent and powerful effect on sales.

Model Metrics

Key evaluation metrics:

  • R² (Coefficient of Determination): Measures variance in sales explained by ad spends.
  • RMSE (Root Mean Squared Error): Quantifies prediction error.
  • MAE (Mean Absolute Error): Robustness against large deviations.
  • Adjusted R²: Accounts for multiple predictors and prevents overfitting.
